name: Compendium of Monstrous Affairs
description:
Compendium of Monstrous Affairs is a Visual Novel Horror Game. 

The player is an occult enthusiast who runs a paranormal investigations office and specializes in supernatural occurrences.

After doing research and obtaining more insight on the potential monster culprit, the player sets off to help the monster and in doing so, help the client as well.

Compendium of Monstrous Affairs is in prototype!

Investigate the baffling appearance of animal carcasses, mauled beyond recognition

Explore a sleepy city and find clues to help your case 

Prepare yourself and be ready to face the eerie unknown

  • More in-depth investigative gameplay
  • More interactions and features for the Compendium
  • Romanceable options!!! Bring your favourite monster out on a romantic date!
